Ukrainian parliamentary majority's trust in Zelensky is shaken
description: Members of President Volodymyr Zelensky's party felt manipulated into passing a law stripping anti-corruption agencies of their independent status. Some criticized the 'bubble' formed by the president's entourage.

description: A former aide to far-right MP Maximilian Krah stands accused of passing sensitive information to the Chinese authorities.

headline: Legal battle erupts over inheritance of former richest man in China
description: Zong Qinghou, founder of the Wahaha beverage empire who died in 2024, reportedly fathered three children from an extramarital affair. These children are now contesting the late tycoon's inheritance with his legitimate daughter, who has become CEO of the company.

headline: Senegal seeks to shed light on political violence committed under Macky Sall
description: According to Amnesty International, at least 65 people were killed during protests against the government between 2021 and 2024. The justice minister has referred the matter to the public prosecutor to investigate the deaths.

headline: Magda Gegenava, chef: 'I became familiar with street food and adapted my recipes so they could be eaten on the go'
description: 'Refuge Recipes' (3/6). This summer, chefs from Refugee Food, a group celebrating its 10th anniversary, are sharing the dish that best defines them. Gegenava is a self-taught chef from Georgia who owns two Paris restaurants, where her khinkalis – plump, juicy dumplings – have become the signature dish.

description: 'Chefs' Gardens' (5/5). The father-son duo have brought back countless varieties of plants from their travels abroad, showcasing them in their dishes at Le Suquet, their restaurant in southern France.

headline: After Ferrand-Prévot's triumph in the Tour de France Femmes, France 'is now enamored by women's cycling'
description: The French cyclist claimed victory in the iconic race on Sunday, with international media reporting that the fourth edition 'delivered' on all expectations.

headline: Three erotic experiences inspired by boredom
description: Maïa Mazaurette is on a mission to spice up your steamy summer nights. This week, she suggests doing absolutely nothing – except letting your thoughts wander, caressing yourself for a long time and questioning your certainties.
